name: Dungeon Boss Simulator ALPHA
description:
How to play:

Mouse: Match gems and turn "auto-cast" off and on for the different abilities.

WASD or Arrow Keys: moves the Green square around. It can heal and revive nearby allies so long as those abilities have enough charge.

Keep your group alive and match gems to power them up and beat the Boss!

This is the alpha for a game jam project I made awhile back called "Dungeon Boss Simulator". Currently it only has 1 boss battle, but I will be adding more in the near future. I wanted to nail down the gameplay first and get the game to a point where the only thing left to do is add bosses. There are no menus as of yet, but I felt that the current gameplay and look is almost done if not already. Any feedback will be appreciated, along with suggestions. Also please inform me of any bugs you find.

Game and art by me

Music and sound effects by Rikileitr

Current to-do list:

  • Balance/redo sound effects
  • Add timer to keep track of fastest kills
  • Add menus
  • Work up to a total of 9 bosses
